attributes.title: tomfoolery at its finest
attributes.review: I quite frankly ADORE donald, so I was appalled to find that this app is a total sham. When I opened the app, some sort of realistic orange troll doll popped up and told me to vote for him for president. I nearly had a heart attack, I could have died. I don‚Äôt know what you people THINK Donald looks like, but lemme tell you right now he is a DUCK, not a troll. Get it right. Do better. (i‚Äôm melania btw)

My crow warned me but I didn‚Äôt listen and now I‚Äôm paying the price.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i wish i could give 0 stars. this app deported my neighbors, raped my daughter, gave my mom corona virus, turned my uncle racist, disregarded the lives of my black co-workers, let russia hunt my cousin in the military, took away the ability to adopt from my lbgtq+ sister, sent my baby niece to school during a pandemic, killed my dog for protesting oppression, and put up a statue of robert e lee in my front yard.

attributes.title: SAD
attributes.review: this app is the SAD of all apps. four years ago I could enjoy oranges without thinking about them. but now, they remind me of mr mac and cheese spray tan. every time I pick up an orange, I shudder. I get nightmares. this app has given me hallucinations of little oranges running around. think shrek 3 hallucination dream scene where shrek is freaking out about not pulling out. im scared. and above all, I am SAD

attributes.title: Terrible, slow and freezes
attributes.review: I hate this App. It is slow, always freezes and I can never load anything from it. Also right off the bat it asks for you phone number which is a big security issue. So no If I could give it zero stars I would. But I cannot so I give it a one star review

attributes.title: Infrigement of my rights!
attributes.review: After doing some data mining through the app I learned that this app tracks you! This app gains access to your location, camera, microphone, AND your keyboard. This means they have access to your entire personal life, AND can see the info you put in to buy stuff online. This app is awful!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: You would think considering how great our president is this would be a goof app but NOPE. This app made my phone COMPLETELY shut itself down and I couldn‚Äôt turn it on for THREE DAYS. Then it stole my wife avocado and my kids Billie Eilish and Lauv from me! I was left with no money, family, or love. I‚Äôm currently writing this on Ellen‚Äôs smart fridge so that I can tell the world how BAD this app is!
